name: SideNSlice
description:
SideNSlice is a geometric based themed platformer game. 

CONTROLS:

A or <- arrow to move left and D or -> arrow to move right. F for firing laser. SPACE for jump. R for rotating the cube to change laser type.

GOAL:

Collect 4 gems on the top right. They are scattered around the map.

HOW TO PLAY:

Enemies will appear in all spaces and DIFFERENT COLORS. You have to shoot them with the same color of lasers as they are. (Use R to change laser type).

TRICKS:

To climb long walls you can down on to A (or D) to stick to the wall and press SPACE repeatedly. You can perform many other tricks which you can discover on your own.

ENJOY!

(Note: Please use Alt + F4 for quiting the game)

UPDATED WHAT?

Added Instructions in the game, enemies have healthbar to keep track of their health.
